title: Grilled Garlic Herb Chicken Sandwiches
directions: Heat grill. Grill thawed chicken breasts about 15 minutes until cooked through, turning occasionally for even cooking.
Stir Basil Mayo ingredients in small bowl until blended.
Spread buns with mayo. Add grilled chicken, lettuce and tomato. Salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) package Market Pantry™ Frozen Garlic Herb Chicken Breasts, thawed according to package directions
